AI in 2025

Published

25 Nov 2025

Things look very different in 2025 than in 2017 when I first started.

Scaling works. Making things cheaper works. Making things faster works. Everything else is cherry on top. What is the most important question now?

Ask: would this have been invented if I don’t do it?

Academia: if I show it to people in the industry, would they regard it as just an ablation for them? Is it too complex to use in a real system?

Steam engine to the second law of thermal dynamics.

Academia vs industry.

Felix Hill’s passing and reflection.

https://ai-2027.com/

https://www.darioamodei.com/essay/machines-of-loving-grace
